name: The Last Dungeon
overview: This is my submission to the AmiGameJam 2022 which had the theme Swords and Sorcery. You have previously nearly reached the end of your quest. All that stands in your way now is The Last Dungeon! Choose your character, Barbarian or Wizard, or team up together in 2 player co-op. Explore the maze like like dungeon mapping each room as you go. Fight or avoid the dungeon guardians waiting for you inside. Press fire to attack. Hold fire THEN a direction to use your second item. Rooms will reveal secrets to the curious! Good luck on your quest brave adventurer!!!
